comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogs

Class DirectoryPeerListDialogBuilder<D extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogs.DirectoryDialogBuilder<D>
      • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogs.DirectoryPeerListDialogBuilder<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of administrative data handled by the directory.

    public class DirectoryPeerListDialogBuilder<D extends java.io.Serializable>
extends DirectoryDialogBuilder<D>
    Builder of a Dialog box that displays information on the current nodes maintained by the directory
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam
